managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us, Kelvin. It is always a delight to know that our close proximity to SFO was a great convenience to our guests and that you enjoyed the beautiful waterfront views. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

review.title: nice hotel close to SFO international airport
review.reviewText: stayed overnight to be in close proximity to airport. nice water from room view and only took a few minutes to get over to airport. I would stay here again if in the SFO area and wanted a hotel in close proximity to reduce travel time

managementResponses.response: It is wonderful to hear your kind words, we are so glad that you enjoyed our convenient location, beautiful lobby & excellent fitness facilities. Should your travels bring you back to San Francisco, it would be our pleasure to welcome you again soon.

review.title: Comfy
review.reviewText: Easy to freeway. Nice room n lobby. Great gym. Overall it's worth staying.

managementResponses.response: We sincerely appreciate your kind words, Beverly! Nothing pleases us more than knowing that you found our location to be convenient and that you were able to fully relax in our open waterfront lobby. We look forward to another opportunity at hosting you here on the waterfront!

review.title: Nice hotel, very clean
review.reviewText: Great experience!!! Hotel was convenient and the lobby was very inviting. Location was good as well.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your kind remarks, Vicky! While we are thrilled that you enjoyed a nice, relaxing stay, we apologize for the inconveniences you experienced in your room. We will be looking into your concerns internally and hope that you will allow us another opportunity to provide you with the 5-star stay you deserve.

review.title: A very nice respite from the busy buzz of the city
review.reviewText: Was given a partial bay view, and view of rooftop parking lot of next bldg. However, hotel had a nice ambience, lobby was beautiful, room was very clean except for dusty furnitures and bathroom door handle that came off.

managementResponses.response: We are truly disappointed to read that your stay with us did not meet your expectations and apologize that our team did not provide you with the friendly, helpful service that we strive for. It may also please you to know that our M Club Lounge provides 24-hour access for beverages & snacks. We hope you will allow us another opportunity to improve upon your stay.

review.reviewText: Very patronising front desk staff who were rude at check out.
review.negativeRemarks: Remarkable that an Airport hotel does not provide food - even by room service - on a 24 hour basis.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for your kind words, Eva! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our luxuriously comfortable & clean rooms. Should your travels bring you back to San Francisco, we would love to welcome you for a longer getaway on the waterfront!

review.title: Overnighter between flights - super comfortable
review.reviewText: Premium bedding and cleanliness are super important to me. I wished I could have spent more time here at the hotel!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to share your excellent experience with us! We are so glad that you had the chance to dine with us on the waterfront and that you found our location to be convenient. We look forward to our next opportunity to welcome you!

review.title: Everything was great except the price was high.
review.reviewText: The hotel was close to the airport and provided transportation early in the morning.
review.positiveRemarks: Beautiful!  Also very good food in the restaurant that overlooked the water and the planes landing at SFO.

managementResponses.response: We are so delighted to read your wonderful review, thank you for sharing. It was our pleasure to welcome you for an excellent stay and look forward to our next opportunity to host you on the Bay!

review.title: Very clean modern hotel near airport.
review.reviewText: Stayed here to be near family and airport,  Excellent!

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for your kind review, Aimee! It was truly our pleasure to welcome you for a comfortable, relaxing stay. We appreciate your patience & understanding regarding the washing machines and are glad that everything was resolved. Thank you again, we look forward to our next opportunity to host you.

review.title: First in San Fran
review.reviewText: We loved our stay!  Beautiful view. Wonderful hotel and staff. We enjoyed the walk to the BART and along the shoreline. Friendliest staff.  There was a mishap with the guest washing machines and the hotel staff took care of the issue.  Thankful to have service like this!!!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Peter. We are so glad you enjoyed a beautiful, comfortable room with us and hope that you had a chance to relax in our open lobby while watching planes take off & land. We sincerely look forward to welcoming you for your next visit!

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: It was conveniently located with beautiful airport and bay view.
review.negativeRemarks: Upgrade the lobby and lounge area.

managementResponses.response: We appreciate you sharing your experience with us. While we are pleased you enjoyed our comfortable guest rooms, we are disappointed to hear that our dining options at Hangar Steak did not meet your expectations. We kindly thank you for your feedback and hope to improve upon your future stay!

review.title: Nice but noisy
review.reviewText: The room and bathroom were very clean.  However, the the noise from the airport was quite noticeable especially late night when all the red-eye flights take off.  The food was overpriced and sub-par.  One notch above Denny's and there wasn't much of an alternative in the surrounding area.
review.negativeRemarks: better noise isolation and make wifi free.

managementResponses.response: We truly appreciate you bringing this to our attention and we apologize for the incidents you experienced in our pool area. We want to assure you that the surrounding tiles and areas around the pool are non-slip and these issues have been handled by our front desk team. Should your travels bring you back to San Francisco, we hope you will allow us the opportunity to improve upon your experience!

review.title: Extremely dangerous pool area!
review.reviewText: Room was fine.  Pool area uses ceramic tile all around pool and hot tub.  With the water from folks getting out of the pool,  creates a super slippery area. 2 of my kids slipped and fell, and we're brused and sore for a few days. .. with slippers on, and  yes,  they were walking! Another guest fell while I was there,  and a woman that worked there almost fell.  Design is very bad.  Informed the font desk,  and all they could say was,  'yeah, I'll let the people that designed the hotel know. '  Not good enough for me.  This is a hazard to everyone that uses the pool and hot tub. Please replace with less slippery material before someone gets hurt. Thank you.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are disappointed to read that you did not enjoy the 5-star stay we strive to provide all our guests. Please accept our sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced, we will be sure to share your concerns with our team to improve.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel but they got the reservation for a handicap accessible room wrong and we had to be unpleasant in order to get them to make one available an hours after arrival.  It was adequate, but for $340/day we expected a larger room.  We've stayed in larger handicap rooms at other hotels for half the price.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are so thrilled that you enjoyed an excellent stay. As always, we strive to provide our guests with world-class experiences, so we appreciate your feedback regarding the beds. Should your travels bring you back to San Francisco, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back again for another 5-star stay.

review.title: Nice hotel with a beautiful view
review.reviewText: Overall it was excellent, except the bed wasn't so comfortable!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your review with us. We are always striving to perfect the art of hosting, so we truly appreciate your valued feedback regarding our breakfast. We are so thrilled that you experienced a quiet stay at our convenient airport location and that you had a chance to enjoy a few meals during your time with us. It pleases us to know that our team provided you with excellent service and that our fitness center was competitive against other similar hotels. Should your travels bring you back to San Francisco, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back to the waterfront.

review.title: In and out for business.
review.reviewText: Didn't spend a lot of time in the hotel but enjoyed breakfast every morning. Great staff and larger exercise facility than most hotels I have stayed in.
review.negativeRemarks: Open breakfast earlier for those who have to get going early in the morning.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your 5-star review! We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and we sincerely hope to welcome you back again very soon.

We are truly disappointed to learn about your experience. We strive to provide our guests with excellent customer service and staying experience, and we sincerely apologize that your visit did not meet expectations. We hope you will allow us another opportunity in the future to improve upon your experience, thank you.

review.title: Awful hotel with a view of the garbage container
review.reviewText: IT was the worse hotel I have ever stayed in - would not recommend it to anyone.
review.locationRemarks: Don't know - left as fast as I could

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your 5-star review. Nothing makes us happier than knowing our guests enjoyed watching the airplanes land and take off from our convenient airport location. Should you return to San Francisco, it would be our pleasure to welcome you back for another 5-star stay!

review.title: Plane spotting
review.reviewText: Take your ear plugs if you want to sleep between 7am and 11pm.  Fun to watch airplanes land and take off.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your 5-star review, Clarice. Nothing makes us happier than knowing you loved the atmosphere of our expansive lobby no matter the time of day. We are so glad you had a smooth, efficient check-in and an even better dining experience. We are delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back again for another 5-star stay.

review.title: Modern and efficient, overall excellent experience
review.reviewText: Great atmosphere and attitude.  Efficient check in and delicious food.  Loved the open lobby/lounge for quiet daytime and energetic evenings.

managementResponses.response: Hi, Shannon. We are blown away by all your kind words and couldnâ€™t be happier to hear about your 5-star experience. We are so glad you enjoyed our quiet location, quick access to local areas and waterfront views. It is truly wonderful to know that you thoroughly enjoyed your clean, well-maintained room. We are so thrilled you and your wife were amazed by your dining options during your stay with us, it is always amazing to hear our guests appreciate our fresh ingredients and carefully-prepared dishes. We are delighted you were able to take advantage of our doggie relief station, nothing makes us happier than knowing we can make traveling a little easier for our guests and their pets. Thank you again for your kind words, we look forward to welcoming you back again for another 5-star stay.

review.title: Wonderful experience!
review.reviewText:
Great stay!  From our initial experience of arrival and dropping off our car to the valet (a very friendly gentlemen welcomed us and took care of the car quickly), to a pleasant gentlemen at the desk who answered all of our questions & checked us in quickly (we did have reservations for our 3 day stay), to other hotel staff who were all smiles and acknowledged us as we arrived and got our luggage to the elevator.  Beautiful room, great views of the waterfront and arriving and departing flight at SFO.
Surprisingly quiet, giving the proximity to the airport.  Clean, spacious, and well-appointed comfy room.   Our experiences at Hangar Steak for both dinner and breakfast were wonderful.  Expertly prepared steaks (tried the filet.  Best I've EVER eaten). My wife had the free-range chicken with root veggies.  She thought it was AMAZING.  Local produce was used, and it's SO fresh!!   The breakfast buffet was also beyond awesome.   Also, we appreciated having a dog relief station right out back for our service dog, complete with baggies.  All staff members ROCK!  Awesome folks, truly!  Marriot just GETS the concept of hospitality. We'll be staying here again very soon!
review.locationRemarks: Quick access to 101 and all this beautiful city has to offer.  A really great location, close to everything in minutes.
